publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3703 Lewis Macdonald: The Draft Primary Medical Services (Scotland) Act 2004 (Modification of the National Health Service (Scotland) Act 1978) Order 2005—That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Primary Medical Services (Scotland) Act 2004 (Modification of the National Health Service (Scotland) Act 1978) Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Mr Andy Kerr*

S2M-3703 Lewis Macdonald: The Draft Primary Medical Services (Scotland) Act 2004 (Modification of the National Health Service (Scotland) Act 1978) Order 2005—That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Primary Medical Services (Scotland) Act 2004 (Modification of the National Health Service (Scotland) Act 1978) Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Mr Andy Kerr
